name: Bacterial assault
description:
did this overnight- the theme was "sickness"

HOW TO PLAY

click on a tower from the hotbar

then left click on an unoccupied square 

towers cost money

money is gained after completing a wave or using a RER tower

you can use blocks and towers to alter the path of the enemies

right click a tower or block for a refund

enemies get stronger and faster as the waves go on so dont get cocky.

music by bensound.com
